message.original: 竜力の淀みに立ち入るため レオの待つ禊の神殿へ向かう
レオの待つ禊の神殿へ向かう
message.translation: Head to Leo waiting in the Temple of Purification

message.original: 神殿の奥で待つレオの元へ向かう
message.translation: Seek out Leo waiting in the temple

message.original: 竜力の淀みし場所へ向かう
message.translation: Head to the location of the stagnant dragon force

message.original: 白竜神殿のセシリーの元へ向かう
message.translation: Head to Cecily in the White Dragon Temple

message.original: 謁見の間のジョゼフに報告する
message.translation: Report to Joseph in the Audience Chamber
